short_summary: Intermediate project management resource services for the Future Aircrew Training Program
description: The requirement is for one (1) intermediate project management resource to provide professional services for DND/RCAF, specifically in support of the Future Aircrew Training Program for site support services and facility management.
tags: Services aux ressources humaines; Services-conseil en affaire /Services de gestion du changement; Service de gestion de projets
full_summary:
## TASK BASED PROFESSIONAL SERVICES PROCUREMENT NOTICE

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01007762
* **Publication Date**: September 21, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 6, 2022 at 14:00:00

### Procurement Description

The Department of National Defence and the Royal Canadian Air Force are seeking a contract provider to deliver intermediate project management resources for site support services and facility management. The contract is expected to commence upon award and run until May 31, 2024.

### Security Requirements

The selected contractor must meet security requirements outlined in the request for proposal (RFP). For more information, please consult Part 6 of the RFP.

### Controlled Goods

The procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program, in compliance with the Defence Production Act.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is governed by the following trade agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada – European Union Comprehensive Economic and Free Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada – Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada – Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA)
* Canada Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada – Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
* Canada – Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada – Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require further clarification on the procurement, please contact:

Katelyn Ferguson
Phone: 343-574-9126
Email: katelyn.ferguson@forces.gc.ca

Note: The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
